attributes.action: Unhappy with the running of the country
attributes.additional_details:
General disappointment with the running of the country and how this government is tackling the problem of greedy banks, raising fuel duty on already expensive fuel, raising tobacco tax (not a smoker) to ensure that they keep the revenue coming in from existing smokers, granny tax that has just been brought in and the feeling that the general public will bear the brunt, go without, shell out more etc; when public servants won't disclose what they earn and the level of tax they pay.

The general public are not a bottomless pit, they don't have money trees at the bottom of their gardens - we need to stand together to stop this and put an end to the government bleeding us dry.
